channel.title: Im in so much trouble
channel.description: ok so i was running my server on my downstairs home comp, this comp my family uses. My older sister was on (she is 17) and she was watching wat we were typing,cause i was on my laptop, well the server crashed and my friend got mad, i said my sisters on ill fix in a sec, he goes f'in sara (my sister). f'in is not a bad word idk why he said it but she flips out, tells my dad, my dad comes over (hes not into computers like i am) and he thinks my run server is a fricken virus, now im grounded cause wat my friend did, and that i apparently had a virus, and that i play the game too much. they mostly complain how much i play, which is like 3-4 hours in the morning just till i find somthin to do with friends, i don't play on weekdays, only weekends. just thought id share wat my days been like.

item.title: Im in so much trouble
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

Nice going that will teach you to say “f’in” if you can’t say it irl why say it online.

Read full topic
